https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lMjqg9QFEFvcfJXlDgw09jIZmTt.jpg In one fell swoop, nine-year old David Van de Steen lost his mother, his father and his sister in an attack by the Brabant Killers in Aalst. His grandfather, Albert, has the well-nigh impossible task of giving David a new perspective on life, a future. Don't Shoot
